text:
Hana, the costume design for CoMETIK is ready.
Do you want to see it?

Huh, really?
I'd love to see it!

Luca-chan, Haruki-chan, and I...
The three of us...

Yeah, that's right...
This will be your first and last unit costume.

Hana, I want you to cherish the feelings
you have now... What do you think?

I've never worn clothes like this before,
so I wonder if they'll suit me...

But more than that,
I'm really looking forward to it.
